com.devwebsphere.wxs.asyncservice
Interface AsyncServiceManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncServiceManagerImpl
public interface AsyncServiceManager

This allows services to be asynchronously called in a durable manner using exactly once semantics.

Author:
bnewport

Method Summary

Method Detail

getNextClusterUUID

String getNextClusterUUID()
                          throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException
This returns a cluster wide unique ID. The ID is unique within the lifecycle of the ObjectGrid so long as data loss does not occur. That is a partitions primary and replicas do not fail simultaneously AND sync replication is used.

Returns:
A unique identifier.
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridException
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException

sendAsyncMessage

<T> Future<T> sendAsyncMessage(Serializable message)
                           throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException
This sends an async service request and returns a future that allows the result to be retrieved. The message is sent before the method returns regardless of any active transaction.

Parameters:
message - The message and handler
Returns:
The Future to retrieve the result later
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridException
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException

scheduleDurableLocalJob

void scheduleDurableLocalJob(com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.Session localSession,
                             Job job)
                             throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException
This starts a Job within this JVM if the current transaction commits. The job will run on the backup JVM if this one fails before it runs so long as it was 'replicated' over there.

Parameters:
localSession - The transaction to use for scheduling the job
job - The job to run
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException

sendAsyncAllPartitions

<T> Future<Map<Integer,T>> sendAsyncAllPartitions(Serializable multicastMessage)
                                              throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException
This processes the exactly one message on every partition and returns the result of doing this in a Map keyed by partition id.

Parameters:
multicastMessage -
Returns:
A map with the result for each partition
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridException
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.ObjectGridRuntimeException

serialize

<T> SerializedFuture<T> serialize(Future<T> f)
This returns a serializable form of the specific Future. The Future must be one returned by one of the send methods of this interface.

Parameters:
f -
Returns:
